alert.note: Alert for Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 12:03PM CDT until May 11 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM CDT FOR EASTERN STEARNS COUNTY... At 1203 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near St. Joseph, or 10 miles west of St. Cloud, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Waite Park and Holdingford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in the Twin Cities.
